initial_screen_data.text:
Santa's presents have gone missing, and he needs your help to save Christmas! 
 
 Scan all 6 QR codes to win a prize!

instructions_screen_data.title: How to play
instructions_screen_data.text:
Santa's presents have gone missing, and he needs your help to save Christmas! 
 
 Once you've found a QR code during your exploration, open up the scanner (on the previous page)  by tapping the QR code button. Then point the camera towards the QR code. Once you've successfully scanned a QR code,  your phone will prompted by a success message. Once you have scanned all 6 codes you will receive a prize.

initial_screen_data.text:
Santa's presents have gone missing, and he needs your help to save Christmas! Wander through the enchanted forest and explore the magic castle while you uncover missing presents. 
 
 Scan all 6 QR codes to win a prize!

instructions_screen_data.title: How to play
instructions_screen_data.text:
Santa's presents have gone missing, and he needs your help to save Christmas! Wander through the enchanted forest and explore the magic castle while you uncover missing presents. 
 
 Once you've found a QR code during your exploration, open up the scanner (on the previous page)  by tapping the QR code button. Then point the camera towards the QR code. Once you've successfully scanned a QR code,  your phone will prompted by a success message. Once you have scanned all 6 codes you will receive a prize.

initial_screen_data.text:
Follow Santa on his trip around the world as he delivers presents to China, India, Holland, Mexico, France, and England. 
 
 Scan all 6 QR codes to win a prize!

initial_screen_data.text:
Santa crashed his sleigh and his reindeer ran off! The elves are looking for new ways to deliver presents, but all you need to do to save christmas is find those reindeer. 
 
 Scan all 6 QR codes to win a prize!
